item.description:
You are invited to help The Resilience Hub leap beyond its digital domain into some real, live space in Portland!  On Friday March 1st and Saturday March 2nd we invite volunteers with even a little bit of painting/prepping experience to join us for the final push to get color on the walls.

When you RSVP, let us know if you can make it either Friday or Saturday and roughly what times (so we can plan jobs/tools accordingly).  Friday will have a bit more "prep" and Saturday a bit more "painting."

Coffee/tea, snacks and lunch will be provided for all volunteers!

It's not a huge space (about 350sf) and the area we're painting now is only part of that, so we can probably accommodate 6-10 people at a time.

Wear (or bring) clothes you can paint in!  If you have a paintbrush or two, no harm bringing it along in case we need it.  If you have any special skills cutting in, etc. let us know.

Thank you so much for considering helping us out and we look forward to bringing you great programs and services for (at least!) another 7-1/2 years:)  And if you can't make it this time, I'm sure there will be other chances to get involved as the year progresses!
item.how_to_find_us: We are in between Zero Station and Aikido of Maine.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Resilience Hub (New Space!) Prep and Painting Party
